title: V for Vendetta
description: A masked freedom fighter known as "V" takes up arms against a totalitarian government and finds an unlikely ally in a young woman.
actors: Natalie Portman, Hugo Weaving, Stephen Rea, Stephen Fry

title: Vaastu Shastra
description: A doctor and her writer husband find out the hard way that the new house they've purchased isn't as free of dark energy as they imagined.
actors: Sushmita Sen, J.D. Chakravarthi, Piya Rai Chaudhary, Ahsaas Channa

title: Valley Uprising
description: The 50-year history of rock climbing in Yosemite Valley is chronicled in this documentary charting the birth and rise of a rebellious counterculture.
actors: Peter Sarsgaard

title: Valu: The Wild Bull
description: When a tiny village finds itself at the mercy of a rampaging wild bull, help arrives when a pair of city officials plan to catch and kill the creature.
actors: Atul Kulkarni, Mohan Agashe, Bharati Achrekar, Renuka Daftardar

title: Van Helsing
description: Vampire hunter Van Helsing travels to a mysterious region of Europe on a quest to vanquish Count Dracula, the Wolf Man and Frankenstein's monster.
actors: Josie Maran, Hugh Jackman, Elena Anaya, Alun Armstrong

title: Vanish
description: A man launches a desperate search into the heart of the Amazon to find his missing girlfriend amid a rash of mysterious disappearances.
actors: Ismael La Rosa, Oscar Carrillo, Teddy Guzmán, Fernando Bacilio

title: Vanishing Time: A Boy Who Returned
description: Days after her friends disappear during a trip to a mysterious cave, a girl is approached by a grown man claiming to be one of her missing pals.
actors: Gang Dong-won, Shin Eun-soo, Lee Hyo-je, Kim Hee-won

title: Vaya
description: Three youths from rural South Africa set out for Johannesburg, where they're thrust into the seedy underbelly of the city and must fight to survive.
actors: Mncedisi Shabangu, Sihle Xaba, Sibusiso Msimang, Zimkhitha Nyoka

title: Veerappan
description: A police official assembles an elaborate network of spies and undercover operatives to bring down a ruthless bandit with a private army.
actors: Sandeep Bharadwaj, Sachiin Joshi, Lisa Ray, Usha Jadhav

title: Verónica
description: A reclusive psychologist agrees to treat a patient -- whose therapist is missing -- at her remote cabin, where the women test each other's boundaries.
actors: Arcelia Ramírez, Olga Segura, Sofía Garza

title: Veronica
description: In 1991 Madrid, after holding a séance at school, a teen girl minding her younger siblings at home suspects an evil force has entered their apartment.
actors: Sandra Escacena, Claudia Placer, Bruna González, Iván Chavero

title: Very Big Shot
description: When three brothers struggling to go straight become targets of a criminal underworld, they use the making of a movie as a front to transport drugs.
actors: Alain Saadeh, Fouad Yammine, Tarek Yaacoub, Alexandra Kahwaji

title: Vettai
description: This powerful Tamil action film follows the shared fate of two very different siblings: policeman Thiru and his roguish brother, Guru.
actors: Arya, Madhavan, Sameera Reddy, Amala Paul

title: Veve
description: A cheating politician, his distraught wife and an ex-con find themselves caught up in a narcotics trade fraught with intrigue and betrayal.
actors: Lowry Odhiambo, Emo Rugene, Lizz Njagah, Conrad Makeni

title: Victim of Beauty
description: A beauty pageant winner is stalked by a serial killer who kidnaps her sister and torments her family in this thriller based on a shocking true story.
actors: William Devane, Jeri Ryan, Michele Abrams, Nick Searcy

title: Vincent N Roxxy
description: In rural Louisiana, a terse loner forges a redemptive bond with a woman he saved from a killer, but a violent past soon catches up with both of them.
actors: Emile Hirsch, Zoë Kravitz, Emory Cohen, Zoey Deutch

title: Virunga
description: The Oscar-nominated true story of the rangers risking their lives to save Africa's most precious national park and its endangered gorillas.

title: Visions
description: After moving to a vineyard, a pregnant woman is plagued by chilling hallucinations and sets out to uncover the truth about the property's dark past.
actors: Isla Fisher, Anson Mount, Gillian Jacobs, Jim Parsons

title: Viswasapoorvam Mansoor
description: When a mother and her daughter arrive to stay in his home in Kerala, a young Muslim man becomes torn between love, faith and clashing political views.
actors: Roshan Mathew, Asha Sarath, Prayaga Martin, Zarina Wahab

title: Vitti Dandu
description: In a remote village in colonial India, an old man and his grandson display strong differences in their attitudes toward the country's British rulers.
actors: Dilip Prabhavalkar, Ashok Samarth, Yatin Karyekar, Nishant Bhavsar

title: Viva
description: A hairdresser is thrilled when his dream of becoming a nightclub drag performer comes true, until his disapproving estranged father suddenly appears.
actors: Héctor Medina, Jorge Perugorría, Luis Alberto García, Laura Alemán

title: Vizontele
description: In 1974, a rural town in Anatolia gets its first television set -- an event that's met with both excitement and trepidation by the villagers.
actors: Yılmaz Erdoğan, Demet Akbağ, Altan Erkekli, Cem Yılmaz

title: Vizontele Tuuba
description: With civil war looming, a TV-obsessed Turkish town is bemused when a bureaucrat and his daughter arrive to modernize their library.
actors: Yılmaz Erdoğan, Tarık Akan, Altan Erkekli, Cezmi Baskın
